lines.text: Maybe there's a Medusoid Pattern hidden in the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard's</c> tattoos?
Y'know, one of those magic inscriptions that petrifies anyone who reads them?
Just because the guy himself was class-locked doesn't mean he couldn't have had an enchantment like that from someone else.
I- kid, are you givin' me the run-around here? That's not a real thing, is it?
If I gotta worry about turnin' to stone if I look at evidence too close-
Haha, well. It's a thing, but I don't think anyone knows how to draw it anymore. That's some Demigod Age stuff.
Well, yeah. If it were a Medusoid Pattern, we'd both be statues too.
